description:
Today is the day that pet learns what brutal domination is all about. I use a classic spread eagle to demonstrate the brutality of predicament bondage and the intense outcome. It seemed easy enough to be tied this way, but after adding a little extra it became overwhelming for her fast.
She was sent to me to help her excel further as a Top and after today I'm sure she will have a few new tricks up her sleeve. She already had the ability to demand submission, but when it's all said and done, she will be a [REDACTED] to be reckoned with.
title: Lorelei Lee Day 3
